<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/dns"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Saves the DNS settings specified in the request to the current portal.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"dnsName":{"type":"string","description":"The DNS (Domain Name System) configuration name.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"enable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies whether the DNS settings are enabled.","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for managing the DNS (Domain Name System) settings.","title":"DnsSettingsRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Message about changing DNS","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"string"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"StringWrapper"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid domain name/incorrect length of doman name"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"402":{"description":"Your pricing plan does not support this option"},"405":{"description":"Method not allowed"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
